optional_parameters.name: fields
optional_parameters.description: fields of item objects required to be returned, such as title, price and descmodules. Optional value: all the fields in item struct \\\"Item\\\" can be returned, which are separated by \\\",\\\". Newly added returned fields: itemweight (item weight in digital format, including decimals), itemsize (item volume in digital format, including decimals), changeprop (data of basic colors of item).
